Name: Masochisia
About the game: Developers Note: Masochisia is an experimental take on psychological horror games as a narrative. Individuals struggling with depression, abuse or mental illness may be uncomfortable with some of the themes. The experience is intended for mature audiences. 4f 42 45 59 20 4d 45 No one ever really understands you... ...do they? Yes, you're crazy. But so was your Father, your Mother, your Brother. So, if we're being honest with each other, we can't say we're all that surprised are we? The visual hallucinations, the aural terrors, the sensory overloadsâ€¦ more daily routine for you than a burden!
